name: Truck Drive Test
description:
A prototype for an overhead-view racing game to be built in PICO-8. Currently contains a choice between two recolorable vehicles and a single track with no lap timer to drive around on alone. But it seems to work!

x to accelerate, z (the [o] button on PICO-8's controller) to brake, left/right on arrow keys/d-pad to steer.
